title: Ethereum Cat Herders Meeting #102
body:
## Date and Time

Jan 31, 2023, at 15:00 UTC

## Location 

Join Zoom Meeting
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09
Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A


## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 1. Ethereum network upgrades
- Cancun & Deneb
  - Zhejiang public testnet launch on Wednesday, genesis at 15:00 UTC on 1st of Feb.
 - [Shanghai](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/shanghai.md) & [Capella](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/tree/dev/specs/capella)
    - withdrawal-mainnet-shadow-fork-1 planned to be deprecated soon
    - Shanghai - EF devops dashboard [here](https://forkmon.withdrawalsdevnet1.ethpandaops.io/)
- Vitalik's potential [SSZ migration roadmap](https://notes.ethereum.org/@vbuterin/transaction_ssz_refactoring)
  - EtherWorld's article on [Why Ethereum Clients prefer SSZ over RLP?](https://etherworld.co/2023/01/25/why-ethereum-clients-prefer-ssz-over-rlp/)
- [Shanghai page](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/shanghai_upgrade/index.html) at ECH website
- EOF Devnets Breakout Room [Recording 6](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PKwMCmxHcas) [Notes](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EOFBreakOutNotes#-Notes-6)
- EIP-4844 Implementers [notes ](https://twitter.com/terencechain/status/1612857882755858435) & [Video](https://youtu.be/FnKOHR92dXU)

### 2. Events & hackathon
- [ETH TLV](https://www.ethtlv.net/) February 1st to February 9th, 2023
- [ETH Denver](https://www.ethdenver.com/) Feb 24- March 05, 2023 
   - [An event for EIP authors](https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/ethereum-magicians-session-in-denver-2023/12610?u=xinbenlv)
- [Interop Summit](https://interopsummit.com/) Feb 27th â€“ 28th, 2023 (Denver)
- [Gitcoin grants round](https://go.gitcoin.co/blog/announcing-the-gitcoin-alpha-tests) - Jan 17-31, 2023
- [Scaling Ethereum](https://ethglobal.com/events/scaling2023) (ETHGlobal) virtual - Mar 10-29
- [ETHDubai](https://www.ethdubaiconf.org/) Mar 15-16 
- [ETH Porto](https://ethporto.org/) Mar 16-18
- [Ethereum Rio](https://www.ethereumbrasil.com/ethereumrio)- Mar 28-30 
- [Edcon](https://edcon.io/) Vienna- Apr 3-6
- [NFT NYC](https://www.nft.nyc/) - Apr 12-14 
- [ETHGlobal Tokyo](https://tokyo.ethglobal.com/) - Apr 14-16
- [ETHZurich](https://ethereumzuri.ch/) conference -Apr 14-16
- [EthTaipei](https://eth-taipei.notion.site/ETHTaipei-2023-7aba2e9b4d264385ad26cb926639ed3a) hackathon - Apr 21-23& [EthTaipei](https://eth-taipei.notion.site/ETHTaipei-2023-7aba2e9b4d264385ad26cb926639ed3a) conference - Apr 24-25 

### 3. New initiative/association
- Client Diversity [Survey](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdxWpN_kcZj4I_43vME2MOKHq3yD5_OFv8Lj-RO14537r1GLA/viewform) & [Announcement](https://medium.com/ethereum-cat-herders/client-diversity-on-ethereum-network-3854b5c3c95f) 
- GitPOAP for EIP Authors

### 4. General updates
- [ECH Roadmap 2023 & Recap 2022]()
- ECH Stats.
    - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/EthCatHerders) - 6448 Followers
    - [Discord](https://discord.io/EthCatHerders) - 1580 users
    - [YouTube](https://studio.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A) - 2879 subscribers
    - [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/ethereum-cat-herders/) - 264 Followers
- [ECH website](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/)
   - [Issues](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues)
- [ECH engineering](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/266) 
  - [EIP bot](https://github.com/ethereum/EIP-Bot/issues) & [EIPV](https://github.com/ethereum/eipv/issues)
  - Learn2Earn [App](https://l2e.ethereumcatherders.com/), [GitHub](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/L2E)
- ECH Operations 
   - ECH GitHub backup & [YouTube backup](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/ECHBackup)
   - [ECH Podcast](https://open.spotify.com/show/7dgxKMkSyy3HWtQW7OfqXA)
- [EIPs Insight](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight) WIP [EIPsInsight website](https://eipsinsight.com) 
- [PEEPanEIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F)  
    - Upcoming meetings can be found on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)

- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 

  - All Core Dev meeting [Notes 153](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/714)
  - Consensus meeting [Notes 101](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/710)
  - EIPIP meeting 73
  - Shanghai - Capella community call

**Other community meetings**
    -  EIP Editing Office Hour Meeting 10 [Recording](https://youtu.be/Vg2zQ3XWFGU) & Meeting 11 [Agenda](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/207)

### 5. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- Meeting [101](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/blob/master/All%20Ethereum%20Cat%20Herder%20Meetings/Meeting%20101.md)

#### The date for the next meeting - Feb 14, 2023

 (If anything else, leave a comment.)
I changed the date - it read Jan 17 before
